name: Everwind
description:
Game Description: 

There is an old legend that tells of an ancient portal that can only be controlled by the king when he has all 9 Magic Stones. Your mission is to find all the Magic Stones and forge a crown so that the portal can be opened!

Controls:

Move: W A S D or Arrow keys

Fight/Interact: SPACE

Sprint: SHIFT

Credits: Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HAMukFBSm6s
